title: Coming In Hot
description: Get a dose of romance, STAT! Brand New and Exclusive novella to novel length books.Featuring NYT, USA Today, and Amazon bestselling authors, we're Coming In Hot with paranormal to contemporary, and sizzling to seductive bedside manners by the doctors, nurses, paramedics, and more in this boxed set.Paramedical meets paranormal in this steamy set filled with shifters, werewolves, vampires, and more!Limited Time Only.
author: Gina Kincade
